医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
研究强调了ELF4作为发育，免疫和肿瘤学中关键转录因子的作用ELF4是属于ETS家族的转录因子，已成为细胞分化，免疫系统功能和癌症进展的关键调节剂。这项新发表的评论强调了其分子复杂性和临床意义，阐明了其在肿瘤抑制和肿瘤发生中的双重作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/study-highlights-the-role-of-4-as-a-a-key-key-transcription-factor-in-indevelopment-indevelopment-munity-munity-munity-andoncology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/study-highlights-the-role-of-4-as-a-a-key-key-transcription-factor-in-indevelopment-indevelopment-indevelopment-mmunity-mmunity-andoncology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=019f4e64-2c2c-4b2b-9f3f-45b451a777707b Tue, 11 Mar 2025 02:03:44 -0400 Study highlights the role of ELF4 as a key transcription factor in development, immunity, and oncology
解密子宫内膜癌中的肿瘤免疫相互作用发表在基因与疾病中的一篇新评论文章阐明了复杂的分子机制，通过该机制，肿瘤浸润的免疫细胞调节子宫内膜癌（EC）。作为最普遍的妇科癌症之一，由于其与免疫微环境的动态相互作用，EC继续挑战研究人员和临床医生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/deciphering-the-the-the-tumor-immune-interplay-in-endometrial-carcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/deciphering-the-the-the-tumor-mmmune-interplay-in-endometrial-carcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=342D05E7-07A2-4A88-A100-A100-9C4597E844452 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 01:53:01 -0400 Deciphering the tumor-immune interplay in endometrial carcinoma
研究揭示了基于TCM的铁凋亡调节策略对铁吞作用的创新见解是一种独特的程序性细胞死亡形式，正在重塑疾病治疗的景观。这个越来越多的领域突出了传统中药（TCM）如何有效地调节铁凋亡，为各种疾病提供新颖的治疗方法，包括癌症，心血管疾病，神经退行性疾病和器官损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/study-reveals-tcm基于strategies-for-ferroptosis-modulation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/study-reveals-tcm基于-strategies-for-ferroptosis-modulation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=568167f9-A1A8-4462-B112-C6D3BF319841 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 01:49:09 -0400 Study reveals TCM-Based strategies for ferroptosis modulation
利用LNCRNA进行早期诊断和干预急性肾脏损伤长期非编码RNA（LNCRNA）发表在基因与疾病中的一项新评论突出了它们在急性肾脏损伤（AKI）和慢性肾脏疾病（CKD）的发育，诊断和潜在治疗中的关键作用。这些发现强调了外泌体LNCRNA的重要性，后者在肾脏病理学中充当分子调节剂，并对未来的生物标志物发现和治疗性进步抱有希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/harnessing-lncrnas-for-early-diangnosis-and-ingnosis-and-intervention-invention-invention-invention-in-utute-kidney-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/harnessing-lncrnas-for-early-diarly-diarly-diangnosis-and-intervention-ing-intervention-in-utute-kidney-kidney-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34b8e55555555555558-413a-b3f9-b3f9-23ccebf53136 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 01:36:24 -0400 Harnessing lncRNAs for early diagnosis and intervention in acute kidney injury
阿尔茨海默氏症和痴呆症负担的全球差异与社会人口统计学因素有关对阿尔茨海默氏病和其他痴呆症（ADODS）的全球负担和时间趋势的分析表明，与一系列与社会人口统计学发展相关的风险因素（例如教育，收入，生育能力和健康支出）相关的越野越野不平等。 Elsevier发表的《美国预防医学杂志》的新研究呼吁开发不同国家 /地区的有针对性的预防和控制策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/global-disparities-in--in-alzheimers-and-alzheimers-and-dementia-burden-burden-brendia-ben cociodeodeodogrogricon-factors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/global-disparities-in-in-alzheimers-ind-alzheimers-and-dementia-burden-burden-dementia-burden-to-sociodeodeodographic-factors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3476044d-7A86-4129-AD61-DC55EBE64967 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 01:29:54 -0400 Global disparities in Alzheimer's and dementia burden linked to sociodemographic factors
儿童虐待使成人慢性健康状况的风险加倍本周发表的一项针对儿童虐待的新研究发现，与童年时期没有虐待的人相比，经历了童年时期身体和性虐待的成年人的身体和心理健康状况的几率大约是人类和心理健康状况的几率，包括心绞痛，关节炎，哮喘，COPD，COPD，心脏病，抑郁，抑郁症，抑郁症，甚至在考虑受访者的年龄，竞争，收入，收入，健康和健康的行为，以及健康，以及健康的态度，以及健康的行为，以及自我概念。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/Childhood-abuse-doubles-adult-risk-of-chronic-health-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/childhood-abuse-double-double-------------------------------------------------------chronic-health-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9231E54E-51DE-4A95-AAEAE3-7F1DF1DF8F57CD4 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 01:20:38 -0400 Childhood abuse doubles adult risk of chronic health conditions
跨种群的卵巢癌突变显示出相似性和独特的差异由犹他大学亨斯曼癌症研究所（U）和埃默里大学（University）的研究人员领导的卵巢癌个体的广泛肿瘤基因组分析表明，黑人妇女与其他先前研究的人群几乎具有相同的突变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/ovarian-cancer-mutations-across-populations-show-show-simerities-indimerities-and-nique-differences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/ovarian-cancer-mutations-materations-across-populations-show-show-simeriation-simurilities-and-nique-differences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e07503f-1ec3-4419-be555555555-900ddaffa2b1 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 22:48:00 -0400 Ovarian cancer mutations across populations show similarities and unique differences
新测试可以预测癌症免疫疗法的生命副作用日本的医学研究人员发现了一种预测癌症免疫疗法潜在威胁生命的副作用的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/new-test-could-predict-life-tife-life-tive-side-side-side-effects-of-cancer-mmunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/new-test-could-predict-life-tife-life-tife-side-side-side-effects-of-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A1FDC59A-E396-4C86-9BFB-202BE1A79425 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 22:39:00 -0400 New test could predict life-threatening side effects of cancer immunotherapy
三分之一的年轻人估计患有小儿发病新研究表明，在过去的二十年中，慢性病的患病率已上升至前所未有的水平，估计有近3名年轻人现在患有严重影响其生活的儿科发作状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/One-in-three-young-people-estimated-to-live-with-pediatric-onset-chronic-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/One-in-three-young-people-estimated-to-live-with-pediatric-onset-chronic-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=353b1d5a-c9b5-4ced-9385-582197051076 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 22:35:00 -0400 One in three young people estimated to live with pediatric onset chronic conditions
新研究检查了婴儿应激反应性产前压力的时间密歇根州立大学和密歇根大学的一组研究人员发现了有关产前压力时间及其对婴儿压力反应性和气质的影响的新见解，包括性别之间的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/new-study-examines-timing-fiming-fiming-finatal-prenatal-stress-on-on-infant-nfant surspers-reactivity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/new-study-examines-timing-fiming-fiming-fenatal-natal-natal-natal-nfant-on-infant-nfant-infant-infant-infant-infant-surseactivity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9aef1e4-e1de-4CF8-964C-9745AA012158 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 22:31:00 -0400 New study examines timing of prenatal stress on infant stress reactivity
